duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all aspects of event operations, risk assessment, and workload assignment
Serve as the main vendor point of contact for the client supporting leadership decision making for event operations
Organize and lead staff meetings, cross-functional team meetings, and special events
Perform various managerial duties including the overview and approval of work schedules
Establish and oversee a Service Level Management function through preparation and Client presentation of monthly service reviews, quarterly business reviews and formalized SLA reporting

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent knowledge and experience
